roleset.name: determination, estimation, act of measuring

roles.note: Watch out for usages that refer to the standard of measurement rather than the act of 'gauging'. Args 2 and 3 expected to be rare.

example.name: Another
example.text: In such case, the manufacturer shall also record on the Form 179 the result of his gauge of the spirits received.
example.note: Note that an action can have results, but a ruler not so much.

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE. .YY!
example.text: Martin uses body weight as his gauge of maternal metabolic rate.
example.note: bodyweight = gauge = a standard of measurment of ruler, not an act of measuring.

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: He couldn't have been that far off in the dose, in his gauge of its weight.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on gauge-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls estimate-34.2, price-54.4.
